== FOSDEM, Brussels ==

The next "Free and Open source Software Developers European Meeting" will again be a 2 days event, organized by volunteers, to promote the widespread use of Free and Open Source software. Taking place in the beautiful city of Brussels, Belgium's FOSDEM meetings are recognised as some of the best Free and Open Source events in Europe.

FOSDEM 2006 will take place in Brussels during week-end Feb 25&26.

All infos on http://www.fosdem.org
